page_content: The page discusses the appointment of a judge ad hoc to the Zwangsmassnahmengericht.
The page discusses the State Council's digital transformation plan for the legislative period 2022-2026.
The page provides download documents, legal bases, and links related to the import, transit, and export of food, consumer goods, cosmetics, live animals, and animal products.
The page discusses changes to some articles of the regulations concerning the pension plan.
The page discusses the obligation of employers to provide salary certificates and recommends using the certified software Swissdec for electronic transmission.
The page discusses a pilot project aimed at promoting safe cycling to school for children in the canton of Freiburg.
The page did not provide content for analysis.
The page discusses an initiative to save amphibians by setting up fences along roads in the canton of Freiburg.
The page discusses a national youth sports camp in Tenero, where various sports activities are offered to young people.
The page discusses a national action week focused on increasing awareness about cybersecurity and offers a guide on how to protect oneself online.
The page provides download documents, legal bases, and links related to drinking water quality and regulations.
